name: The Lost Runes
description:
This game is made for my 1st interactive devlog video, which you can watch here: https://youtu.be/A7RvYXTvlKk

Find all 9 runes to escape the cursed forest! The enemies will try to pull you back.

Assets used:

  • Cute 2D Girl - Wizard [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/cute-2d-girl-wizard-155796]
  • Fantasy Magic Runes [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/fantasy-magic-runes-92892]
  • Mossy Cavern [https://maaot.itch.io/mossy-cavern]
  • FREE Casual Game SFX Pack [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-54116#content]
  • Fantasy SFX for Particle Distort Texture Effect Library [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/fantasy-sfx-for-particle-distort-texture-effect-library-42146#content]
  • Footsteps - Essentials [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-essentials-189879]
  • Free Sound Effects Pack [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-sound-effects-pack-155776#content]
  • Effect textures and prefabs [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/effect-textures-and-prefabs-109031]
  • Fantasy Effect [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/fantasy-effect-50310]
  • Magical Music Album - 040618 [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/magical-music-album-040618-117907]
